movies.name: Titanic
movies.plot: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

movies.name: Inception
movies.plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

movies.name: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
movies.plot: A married couple discovers that they are both assassins and are assigned to kill each other.

movies.name: Avatar
movies.plot: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

movies.name: The Dark Knight
movies.plot: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

movies.name: Forrest Gump
movies.plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an extraordinary gift for running.

movies.name: Pulp Fiction
movies.plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.name: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.name: The Matrix
movies.plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.name: Gladiator
movies.plot: A former Roman general sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.name: Jurassic Park
movies.plot: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

movies.name: The Lion King
movies.plot: Lion cub and future king Simba searches for his identity. His eagerness to please others and penchant for testing his boundaries sometimes gets him into trouble.

movies.name: Black Panther
movies.plot: T'Challa, the King of Wakanda, must defend his land from being torn apart by enemies from outside and within.

movies.name: Frozen
movies.plot: When their kingdom becomes trapped in an eternal winter, fearless Anna teams up with rugged mountain man Kristoff and his loyal reindeer Sven to find her sister Elsa, whose icy powers trapped their kingdom.

movies.name: Finding Nemo
movies.plot: A clown fish named Marlin is overly cautious with his son Nemo, so when Nemo is unexpectedly captured, Marlin must venture out into the ocean to find him.

movies.name: The Godfather
movies.plot: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.name: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
movies.plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee, and a princess to save the galaxy from a mysterious villain.

movies.name: Spider-Man: Homecoming
movies.plot: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his secret identity as Spider-Man.

movies.name: The Avengers
movies.plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army.

movies.name: Guardians of the Galaxy
movies.plot: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

movies.name: Django Unchained
movies.plot: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

movies.name: Interstellar
movies.plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to save Middle-earth.

movies.name: Coco
movies.plot: A boy named Miguel dreams of becoming a musician and finds himself in the Land of the Dead.

movies.name: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.plot: A young FBI cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer.
